Why did r make first switch

Source: R/gss_vars_114.R
switwhy1.Rd

switwhy1

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question I'd like to go over your religious preferences since you were raised as a (RELIGION AND/OR DENOMINATION MENTIONED IN RELIG16/DENOM16). Have you ever had another religious preference besides being (RELIGION AND/OR CHURCH DENOMINATION MENTIONED IN RELIG16/DENOM16). Yes................(ASK A) No..............(GO TO MARELIG) C2. Why did you become a (FIRST/SECOND MENTION)? (1) Why first switch made
